channel.title: Its soo simpile.. Can u just tell me..?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Using wireless BELKIN router and i have to open the ports of course!! I use PORT CHECKER AND they are closed.
I not sure wat to put here:
[img]http://www.graphicshost.net/images/se9sj94qguv8dw.jpg[/img]
I thinks thats what im getting wrong.. thus not opening my ports.
Can someone tell me what to put there.. or how i open it etc.

item.title: Its soo simpile.. Can u just tell me..?
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

I found that with windows vista, down the bottom right hand corner of your screen you have your internet connected, wave your cursor over that and it will give you something like 192.168.2.6 or something, If you don’t have vista or windows 7 i dunno xD

Read full topic
item.source: Its soo simpile.. Can u just tell me..?

item.title: Its soo simpile.. Can u just tell me..?
item.dc:creator: @MobilScape MobilScape
item.description:
@MobilScape wrote:

I did that. SO, its like the image up the top but with 5 at the end.

Still says “port not open”

Why?

Read full topic
item.source: Its soo simpile.. Can u just tell me..?

item.title: Its soo simpile.. Can u just tell me..?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:6, topic:343873”]The open space is for the last digits of your IPv4 Address, found via ipconfig.[/quote]It’s normally one number… and it’s for your Local Area Network IP Address.

Read full topic
item.source: Its soo simpile.. Can u just tell me..?

There only 1 number 192.168.2.(5)

??

item.title: Its soo simpile.. Can u just tell me..?
item.dc:creator: @fallen_angel666 fallen_angel666
item.description:
@fallen_angel666 wrote:

put your router’s ip address in there.

Note: put the last number in the ip in that box.

item.title: Its soo simpile.. Can u just tell me..?
item.dc:creator: @Dead_Inside Dead Inside
item.description:
@Dead_Inside wrote:

click start then type cmd and type ipconfig
there you will have ip4 adress or sommtin type the last 3 numbers in there.
